name: Actual FPS
description:
(My first ACTUAL FPS game.)

No enemies, but there are destructables and a shooting gallery.

FPS_Game.rar - Alpha version

Actual FPS.zip - Beta version

A simple FPS.

System Requirements:

OS: Windows XP 32-bit

CPU: 2Ghz dual core

RAM: 2GB

GPU: 512MB GeForce

Controls:
WASD: move
Mouse: Look
Spacebar: Jump
LMB: Shoot
RMB: ADS
lShift: Sprint
Q: Reset level

R: Reload

See LookAtMe file for more information.

If you have questions or comments, contact me at thesavage4561@gmail.com.
